title: Authorizes municipalities to re-direct property tax payments made by certain project occupants
summary: Authorizes municipalities to re-direct real property tax payments made by project occupants which agree to invest in or construct infrastructure improvements for certain economic development projects; such re-directed payments shall be used to retire any debt incurred for the construction and development of such infrastructure improvements.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorizing municipalities to re-direct a portion of the real property taxes made by certain project occupants
